articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Down 2% Despite Retail Rotation: What's Going On?
articles.mainIdea: Bitcoin, Ethereum Down 2% Despite Retail Rotation: What's Going On?
articles.summary: Benzinga: Bitcoin, Ethereum Down 2% Despite Retail Rotation: What's Going On?. Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) and Ethereum (CRYPTO: ETH) saw $1.4 billion in liquidations over the past week as retail capitulates on altcoins and rotates back into majors. What Happened: Bitcoin slipped below $85,000 mid-week before grinding back to $90,000 ... Related tickers mentioned: BTC-USD, ETH-USD.
